topic.title: Unlimit Talk has been truly upgraded to be an Unlimited Talk Forum!
topic.body:
[Unlimit Talk ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HMLvnRWViMnuvZc5LK4Dm86sZNcSH1jdh)
has been truly upgraded to be an Unlimited Talk Forum! 
I seeded the site before 2021. In the past, the data limit for each user was only 200 KB.  Now it's been upgraded to be 3 MB. 
According to some Christian associates' feedback, 1 MB can hold near 200,000 words in pure Text format, so 3 MB means it's enough to keep more than 500,000 words.  
This will be enough for true enthusiasts on the Uncensored Freedom of Speech on the Decentralized Web.  
It's suggested other forums focused on serious topics upgrade the data limit to be 500 KB or 1 MB, so as to solve the
